item.description:
Rawbert's Cinco de Mayo Gourmet Feast!

Monday, May 5th, 2008 @ 6:30 PM and 8:00 PM

Rawbert's Organic Cafe
294 Cabot St., Beverly, MA 01915

5-Course Menu:

  • Raspberry Margaritas with Mexi-Pecans
  • Belgian Endive Tamales
  • Nacho & Greens Salad with mild Jalapeno 'Jack Cheese'
  • Chick-UN Fajitas
  • Montezuma's Mocha Cheesecake or
    Juliano's Strawberry Parfait

$35

CALL 978-922-0004 immediately before this sells out!
You must make reservations with Rawbert's Organic Cafe.
(Please mention the Boston Rawfood Meetup for seating.)

Please include seating time (6:30 or 8 PM) in BRM RSVP!


Rawbert's Organic Cafe


Rawbert's Organic Cafe

-----------------------

For upcoming events, please check the calendar

http://rawfood.meetup...

For more information, please check the message board

http://rawfood.meetup...

For Boston Raw Food Group posted files, please check the files section

http://rawfood.meetup...

To promote the BRFG, please print out and post our tear-strip flyer

http://files.meetup.c...

For other raw events around New England, please visit

http://www.NewEngland... .

You may make an optional small donation to our Meetup group via http://www.PayPal.com... to elliott7 (at) comcast.net. Please email after your donation so we may send a thank you.

-------------------------

Enjoy! :)
item.how_to_find_us: Look for the Boston Rawfood Meetup sign on the table.
item.name: Rawbert's Cinco de Mayo Gourmet Feast! @ 6:30 & 8 PM
